content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

You're on the right track by focusing on views, engagement, watch time, and drop-off points to start. These metrics will give you a solid understanding of how your video is performing and where you can improve.

By asking questions and encouraging viewers to share their thoughts in the comments, you'll not only increase engagement but also gain valuable insights into what your audience is interested in and what they'd like to learn more about.

Including a clear CTA at the end of the video is also a great idea. This will help you track the conversion rate and see how many viewers are taking action. Make sure your CTA is specific, actionable, and aligned with your goals.

Remember to keep your video concise, informative, and engaging. Use simple language, relatable examples, and visuals to explain complex SEO concepts. And don't forget to optimize your video's title, description, and tags with relevant keywords to improve its discoverability.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with your video creation, and I hope it resonates with your target audience!
